Sentencas: In conventional plasma spray of SOFC components, the large NiO and YSZ particles used, about 50-150 microns for high porosity coating, reduce the density of three-phase sites for electrode reaction.
Titulo: Solution precursor plasma spray of nickel-yittia stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: In this article, the SPPS process was used to synthesize and deposit Ni-YSZ anodes.
Titulo: Solution precursor plasma spray of nickel-yittia stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The results show that several process parameters have significant effects on the microstructure and phase composition of the deposited material.
Titulo: Solution precursor plasma spray of nickel-yittia stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The deposits were composed of tower-like, irregularly shaped agglomerates and smooth surface deposits.
Titulo: Solution precursor plasma spray of nickel-yittia stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The sizes of the agglomerates increase with the decrease of the plasma-torch power and most are not completely molten during the impact.
Titulo: Solution precursor plasma spray of nickel-yittia stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: After heat treatment to reduce the NiO present in the as deposited coatings, the coatings were found to contain spherical YSZ particles about 0.5 mu m in diameter distributed in a continuous Ni matrix, which is verified by both SEM observation and electrical resistance measurement.
Titulo: Solution precursor plasma spray of nickel-yittia stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cell application
